Transparent Overlay Color
settings.info: R,G,B,Alpha. The last value is the alpha/opacity, from 0 to 1. Leave blank if you want no overlay.

settings.content: If you want a completely transparent background: disable the image, set the background color to transparent and leave the overlay color blank.
